mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.TAB_DATE, A.TAB_TYPE, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.DINGTALK_USERNO, A.FLAG, A.CREATED_BY, A.CREATE_TIME, A.MODIFY_BY, A.MODIFY_TIME, B.USERID, C.TAB_URL, B.ADACCOUNT, A.DINGTALK_FLAG FROM TAB_01_CONTENT A LEFT JOIN DD_001_DINGTALK_USER B ON A.DINGTALK_USERNO = B.JOBNUMBER LEFT JOIN TAB_02_TABTYPE_URL_MAPPING C ON A.TAB_TYPE = C.TAB_TYPE WHERE (A.FLAG = '0' OR A.DINGTALK_FLAG = '0') AND C.TAB_STATUS = '1' ORDER BY A.TAB_DATE, A.CREATE_TIME

SELECT A.ID, A.TAB_DATE, A.TAB_TYPE, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.DINGTALK_USERNO, A.FLAG, A.CREATED_BY, A.CREATE_TIME, A.MODIFY_BY, A.MODIFY_TIME, B.USERID FROM TAB_01_CONTENT A LEFT JOIN DD_001_DINGTALK_USER B ON A.DINGTALK_USERNO = B.JOBNUMBER WHERE A.DINGTALK_FLAG = '2' ORDER BY A.TAB_DATE

SELECT A.USER_NO, C.USERID, B.TAB_URL FROM TAB_03_USER_TABTYPE_MAPPING A JOIN TAB_02_TABTYPE_URL_MAPPING B ON A.TAB_TYPE = B.TAB_TYPE JOIN DD_001_DINGTALK_USER C ON A.USER_NO = C.JOBNUMBER WHERE A.TAB_STATUS = '1' AND B.TAB_STATUS = '1' AND A.TAB_TYPE = #{tabType} ORDER BY A.USER_NO
SELECT DISTINCT A.BACH_ID BATCH, A.TITLE TITLE, A.TITLE_TIME TITLE_TIME, A.TAB_TYPE TAB_TYPE FROM TAB_01_PRODUCT_CONTENT A WHERE A.FLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.BACH_ID

SELECT A.ID, A.BACH_ID, A.TAB_DATE, A.TAB_TYPE, A.TITLE_TIME, A.TITLE, A.TAB_PRODUCT_SEQ, A.TAB_PRODUCT_TYPE, A.SHIP_QTY, A.SHIP_AMOUNT, A.FLAG, A.SHIP_PLAN_QTY, A.SHIP_PLAN_AMOUNT, A.SHIP_QTY_RATE, A.SHIP_AMOUNT_RATE, A.SUB_TAB_PRODUCT_TYPE, A.SUB_SHIP_QTY, A.SUB_SHIP_AMOUNT, A.SUB_STANDARD_TAB_PRODUCT_TYPE, A.SUB_STANDARD_SHIP_QTY, A.SUB_STANDARD_SHIP_AMOUNT, A.DAY_TAB_PRODUCT_TYPE, A.DAY_SHIP_QTY, A.DAY_SHIP_PLAN_QTY, A.DAY_SHIP_QTY_RATE, A.MTD_TAB_PRODUCT_TYPE, A.MTD_SHIP_QTY, A.MTD_SHIP_PLAN_QTY, A.MTD_SHIP_QTY_RATE, A.CREATED_BY, A.CREATE_TIME, A.MODIFY_BY, A.MODIFY_TIME FROM TAB_01_PRODUCT_CONTENT A WHERE A.FLAG = '0' AND BACH_ID = #{batchId} ORDER BY A.TAB_PRODUCT_SEQ
mapper.update: update TAB_01_PRODUCT_CONTENT set FLAG = '1', MODIFY_TIME = GETDATE(), MODIFY_BY='IOT' where bach_id = #{batchId} AND FLAG = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 A.TAB_URL FROM TAB_02_TABTYPE_URL_MAPPING A WHERE A.TAB_TYPE = #{tabType} AND TAB_STATUS = '1'
SELECT A.ID, A.ROBOT_URL, A.SEND_TIME FROM tab_04_robot A WHERE A.TAB_TYPE = #{tabType} AND TAB_STATUS = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into TAB_05_ROBOT_SEND_HISTORY (BATCH_ID,ROBOT_ID, RESULT, MESSAGE, CREATE_TIME,CREATED_BY,MODIFY_TIME,MODIFY_BY) VALUES (#{batchId}, #{robotId}, #{result}, #{message}, GETDATE(), 'IOT', GETDATE(), 'IOT')
